name: F. Copy or Prefix Sum
statement:
You are given an array of integers b_1, b_2,
ldots, b_n.An array a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n of integers is if for each i (1
leq i
leq n) at least one of these conditions is true: b_i = a_i, or b_i =
sum_{j=1}^{i} a_j. Find the number of hybrid arrays a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n. As the result can be very large, you should print the answer
modulo 10^9 + 7.
